about_the_game:
THE STORY
WARNING TABOO 18+: Life has been tough for you as a half-vampire because your kind isn't the most welcome. Add to that your human mother and vampire father are killed when you’re still fairly young.. The tragic incident has brought you closer to your human sisters Valentine and Camilla., with whom you share only your late mother. There’s also your vampires sisters Aditi and Najah that you’re just as close with, with you having the same father. With them being full vampires, they don’t exactly see eye-to-eye with your human sisters, but you try to keep the peace as much as possible, because they're all you have.

Your already difficult life becomes a lot more so when vampires and humans alike suddenly start coming up dead. The very same way your parents died. Before you were young and weak, but now as a relations officer dealing with both vampires and humans, you will investigate who or what exactly is doing this and finally get your revenge.

Although the path to revenge may not be as simple as it seems.

THE GAME PLAY
In Sun Breed, you play as the main character and take control of all the decision-making, such as choosing the way you conduct your investigations into the murders, whether that be a more diplomatic or aggressive approach. You'll also be deciding which characters you'll be spending time with, and how you interact with them. Most choices have hidden points that you gain or lose, so be careful before making a decision!

***A free in-game walkthrough is also included for those who have trouble with selecting the correct choices, or for players who want to access every scene!***

FEATURES
- Name your own character
- Define the relationship within the game
- Select choices that shape the story you want
- Replay the game and choose different choices to access all content

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains age-restricted content solely intended for legal adults 18 years and older. The characters, story, and actions are fictitious. All characters are depicted as 18 and over. Contains nudity, graphic depictions of oral, vaginal and other sexual acts. 

Also, please be aware Sun Breed has strong incestuous relations featuring consenting adults from age 20 and up.

detailed_description:
THE STORY
WARNING TABOO 18+: Life has been tough for you as a half-vampire because your kind isn't the most welcome. Add to that your human mother and vampire father are killed when you’re still fairly young.. The tragic incident has brought you closer to your human sisters Valentine and Camilla., with whom you share only your late mother. There’s also your vampires sisters Aditi and Najah that you’re just as close with, with you having the same father. With them being full vampires, they don’t exactly see eye-to-eye with your human sisters, but you try to keep the peace as much as possible, because they're all you have.

Your already difficult life becomes a lot more so when vampires and humans alike suddenly start coming up dead. The very same way your parents died. Before you were young and weak, but now as a relations officer dealing with both vampires and humans, you will investigate who or what exactly is doing this and finally get your revenge.

Although the path to revenge may not be as simple as it seems.

THE GAME PLAY
In Sun Breed, you play as the main character and take control of all the decision-making, such as choosing the way you conduct your investigations into the murders, whether that be a more diplomatic or aggressive approach. You'll also be deciding which characters you'll be spending time with, and how you interact with them. Most choices have hidden points that you gain or lose, so be careful before making a decision!

***A free in-game walkthrough is also included for those who have trouble with selecting the correct choices, or for players who want to access every scene!***

FEATURES

- Define the relationship within the game
- Select choices that shape the story you want
- Replay the game and choose different choices to access all content

Minimum:

  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Life's been tough for you as a half-vampire with your human mother and vampire father being killed when you’re still young. The tragic incident has brought you closer to your sisters, but your lives are uprooted again when vampires and humans start coming up dead. The same way your parents died.
